official_title: A bill to amend title 18 of the United States Code to allow the transportation and mailing of material concerning lotteries authorized by State law, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Federal criminal code and Postal Service provisions to include the transportation, mailing, and broadcasting of tickets, materials, and equipment as authorized practices in State-conducted lotteries. Removes provisions which restrict such practices to the State in which the lottery is conducted.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 18 of the United States Code to allow the transportation and mailing of material concerning lotteries authorized by State law, and for other purposes.
